questions: Can you walk us through your experience in Software Development over the past 7 years?
How have you utilized your skills in C#, Spring Boot, and React in your previous roles?
Can you provide an example of a challenging project you worked on and how you successfully navigated through it?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the software development industry?
What motivated you to pursue a career in software development?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting issues in your projects?
Can you share a situation where you had to work effectively in a team to deliver a project on time?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively to meet deadlines?
Have you had experience in mentoring or training junior developers in your team?
How do you ensure the quality and efficiency of your code when working on projects?
